item.title: Stunning images of ocean racing
item.description: Sailing Best Photos 2014
item.ExtractedText: << Previous Â Next >> As many as 120 photographers entered the Mirabaud Yacht Racing image award for 2014, hoping to win a prestigious competition open to professional photographers from all over the world. Entries such as this one, which captures competitors at the World Cup Windsurfing event in Finistere in France, are in with a chance of taking home the prize. Loading weather data ...
